title: Neopolitan Fat Bombs
directions: Combine all ingredients (except for cocoa powder, vanilla and strawberries) in a bowl. Use an immersion blender to mix it together.
Separate the mixture between 3 bowls. Add cocoa powder to one, vanilla to another, and strawberries to the last.
Pour chocolate mixture into fat bomb mold, then freeze for 30 minutes. Repeat with vanilla and strawberry layers.
Let freeze for at least 1 hour.
